name: RevokeOauthAccessToken
description:
Revoke all OAuth access tokens for an account.

This tool revokes all OAuth access tokens for a given account associated with your application. It should be called when you need to invalidate the access tokens generated through the OAuth flow. Note that all tokens will be revoked regardless of which one is specified.

parameters.name: application_client_id
parameters.description: The Square-issued ID for your application, found on the OAuth page in the Developer Dashboard.

value_schema.description:
The Square-issued ID for your application, which is available on the **OAuth** page in the
[Developer Dashboard](https://developer.squareup.com/apps).

parameters.name: merchant_access_token
parameters.description: The access token of the merchant whose token you want to revoke. Cannot be used with `merchant_id`.

value_schema.description:
The access token of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `merchant_id` if you provide this parameter.

parameters.name: merchant_id_to_revoke
parameters.description: The merchant ID whose token you want to revoke. Do not use if 'access_token' is provided.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `access_token` if you provide this parameter.

parameters.name: terminate_single_access_token
parameters.description: If true, terminate only the specified access token without revoking the entire authorization. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
If `true`, terminate the given single access token, but do not
terminate the entire authorization.
Default: `false`

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description:
The Square-issued ID for your application, which is available on the **OAuth** page in the
[Developer Dashboard](https://developer.squareup.com/apps).

value_schema.description:
The Square-issued ID for your application, which is available on the **OAuth** page in the
[Developer Dashboard](https://developer.squareup.com/apps).

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description:
The access token of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `merchant_id` if you provide this parameter.

value_schema.description:
The access token of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `merchant_id` if you provide this parameter.

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `access_token` if you provide this parameter.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the merchant whose token you want to revoke.
Do not provide a value for `access_token` if you provide this parameter.

parameters.name: revoke_only_access_token
parameters.description:
If `true`, terminate the given single access token, but do not
terminate the entire authorization.
Default: `false`

value_schema.description:
If `true`, terminate the given single access token, but do not
terminate the entire authorization.
Default: `false`

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
